title: Dog Breed Quiz
description: Identify dog breeds from descriptions of their traits

questions.question: Which large dog breed is known for its golden, flowing coat, gentle temperament, and is one of the most popular family dogs and guide dogs in the world?
Which small, wrinkly-faced dog was originally bred as a companion for Chinese royalty, has a flat nose and large round eyes, and is known for its charming personality?
Which German breed is known for its black and tan coloring, high intelligence, and is widely used as a police dog, military dog, and search-and-rescue dog?
Which spotted dog breed is known for its white coat covered in black or liver spots and is historically associated with firehouses and horse-drawn carriages?
Which tiny dog breed from Mexico is the smallest recognized breed in the world, often weighing less than 6 pounds, and has both smooth and long-coat varieties?
Which large, fluffy white dog breed was originally used in the Pyrenees Mountains to guard sheep from wolves and bears, and has a calm, patient temperament?
Which hound breed has an extremely powerful nose, long droopy ears, loose skin, and has been used for centuries to track people and animals over great distances?
Which Japanese breed became famous worldwide after the story of Hachiko, has a thick double coat, curled tail, and a dignified, loyal temperament?
Which short-legged, long-bodied breed was originally bred in Germany to hunt badgers in their burrows and comes in standard, miniature, and kaninchen sizes?
Which elegant sighthound is the fastest dog breed in the world, can reach speeds of 45 miles per hour, and has a slender, aerodynamic build?
Which massive breed from the Swiss Alps was originally used to rescue travelers lost in snow, and is known for its gentle nature despite its enormous size?
Which curly-coated breed comes in standard, miniature, and toy sizes, is considered one of the most intelligent dog breeds, and originated in Germany despite its French association?
Which thick-coated spitz breed from Siberia is known for pulling sleds, has striking blue or multicolored eyes, and is famous for its wolf-like appearance?
Which wrinkly, blue-black tongued breed originated in China, was once used as a guard dog and fighter, and has a distinctive bear-like or hippopotamus-like face?
Which herding breed from Wales has short legs, large upright ears, a foxy face, and became famous as the favorite breed of Queen Elizabeth II?
